nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Journey Through Hyperspace
Star Wars The Clone Wars: Journey Through Hyperspace is a young readers 3D-adventure book based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. It was published by Ladybird Books in 2009.

During the Clone Wars, the Padawan Ahsoka Tano was answering a rebel SOS call. She takes a shuttle to Tatooine. Her master Anakin Skywalker, along with Obi-Wan Kenobi realize she has gone missing, and that the SOS signal was a trap by the Separatists. When the Jedi arrive, they are ambushed by a fleet of ships, but fight their way through and join Tano in fighting off the battle droids.
